ud4.4:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud4.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno kapotakandarāyaṃ viharanti.
ud4.4:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi abbhokāse nisinno hoti aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā.
ud4.4:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve yakkhā sahāyakā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
ud4.4:2.2: Addasaṃsu kho te yakkhā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi abbhokāse nisinnaṃ.
ud4.4:2.3: Disvāna eko yakkho dutiyaṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.4: “paṭibhāti maṃ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṃ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:2.5: Evaṃ vutte, so yakkho taṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:2.7: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:3.1: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho taṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.2: “paṭibhāti maṃ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṃ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:3.3: Dutiyampi kho so yakkho taṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.5: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:3.6: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho taṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.7: “paṭibhāti maṃ, samma, imassa samaṇassa sīse pahāraṃ dātun”ti.
ud4.4:3.8: Tatiyampi kho so yakkho taṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:3.10: Uḷāro so, samma, samaṇo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti.
ud4.4:4.1: Atha kho so yakkho taṃ yakkhaṃ anādiyitvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sīse pahāraṃ adāsi.
ud4.4:4.2: Tāva mahā pahāro ahosi, api tena pahārena sattaratanaṃ vā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṃ vā nāgaṃ osādeyya, mahantaṃ vā pabbatakūṭaṃ padāleyya.
ud4.4:4.3: Atha ca pana so yakkho “ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmī”ti vatvā tattheva mahānirayaṃ apatāsi.
ud4.4:5.1: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena tena yakkhena āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sīse pahāraṃ dīyamānaṃ.
ud4.4:5.2: Disvā yena āyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
ud4.4:5.3: “kacci te, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci na kiñci dukkhan”ti?
ud4.4:5.4: “Khamanīyaṃ me, āvuso moggallāna, yāpanīyaṃ me, āvuso moggallāna;
ud4.4:5.5: api ca me sīsaṃ thokaṃ dukkhan”ti.
ud4.4:6.3: Idha te, āvuso sāriputta, aññataro yakkho sīse pahāraṃ adāsi.
ud4.4:6.4: Tāva mahā pahāro ahosi, api tena pahārena sattaratanaṃ vā aḍḍhaṭṭhamaratanaṃ vā nāgaṃ osādeyya, mahantaṃ vā pabbatakūṭaṃ padāleyya, atha ca panāyasmā sāriputto evamāha:
ud4.4:6.5: ‘khamanīyaṃ me, āvuso moggallāna, yāpanīyaṃ me, āvuso moggallāna;
ud4.4:6.6: api ca me sīsaṃ thokaṃ dukkhan’”ti.
ud4.4:7.2: Yāva mahiddhiko āyasmā mahāmoggallāno mahānubhāvo yatra hi nāma yakkhampi passissati.
ud4.4:8.1: Assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ mahānāgānaṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
ud4.4:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
